title: Bug 128359 - Incorrect logic when adding a filter to the table on the layout
description: We observed that the dataset has 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: When dragging the dataset to the layout and adding another filter (FilterB) to the table, the actual result is that FilterB is applied based on DataResultA instead of DataResultB.
EB: The logic should be corrected so that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultB when a filter is added to the table on the layout.
SR: Investigate and fix the logic issue causing FilterB to be based on the incorrect dataset (DataResultA) instead of the expected dataset (DataResultB) when adding a filter to the table on the layout.
